description.narrative: The objective of the Plaines Wilhems Sewerage Project is to provide an environmentally appropriate collection, treatment of sewages and disposal of effluent and sludge from Plaines Wilhems District. It will improve the sewerage system and increase connectivity of properties in the Plaines Wilhems district. It is intended to avert and reverse the potential for environmental degradation of surface and groundwater resources by wastewater through improved collection and treatment of sewage and disposal of effluent and sludge from the Plaines Wilhems catchments area.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
